text: Amex is hiring software  engineers in Palo Alto, Phoenix, NYC and UK. ( Remote is a possibility as well ) email me @ <mailto:Michael.J.bailey@aexp.com|Michael.J.bailey@aexp.com> with your resume if your are interested
